## Status
DONE

## What Changed
- `components/AppHeader.vue` — reduced to `py-2`, title shrunk to `text-sm font-semibold`, tagline removed, template dropdown downsized to `xs`/`w-28`; added scoped `.app-header` style block
- `components/PreviewPanel.vue` — wrapped rendered template in `<Transition name="template-fade" mode="out-in">` with `:key="activeTemplate"` for smooth 180ms fade+slide on template switch; padding increased to `1.5rem 1.25rem`; transition CSS added
- `pages/index.vue` — panel divider uses lighter `gray-200` border; added `transition` on `.editor-panel` border-color and `.preview-panel` background-color

## Key Decisions
- No debug nav links existed, so requirement 4 was a no-op — confirmed by grepping all `.vue` files for `NuxtLink`/`router-link`/`href.*debug`
- Dropped the "XML to HTML Transformer" tagline from the header entirely rather than shrinking it — saves vertical space and the product name is self-explanatory
- Used `mode="out-in"` on the transition so the old template fades out before the new one fades in, avoiding a flash of overlapping content

- Branch: `feat/visual-polish`
